All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassificationClass
    Classification class given to classified documents.
    Document
    Document to be classified or to train the classifier by.
    DocumentClassifierApp
    Entry point for the DocumentClassifier application.
    FileLoader
    Utility class to load data from files.
    FileSaver
    File saver is used to save information into files.
    IClassifier
    Interface implemented by every classifier.
    IFeatureAlgorithm
    Interface implemented by each feature algorithm.
    KNN
    Finds k nearest neighbours of classified document and returns classification class based on theirs.
    Model
    Model class is used to simplify loading and saving of trained classifier;
    ModelOperator
    File operator class is an abstract class with attributes containing information about tags in file containing saved model.
    NaiveBayesClassifier
    Classifier based on probability model.
    TermBinary
    Simple binary feature algorithm, assigning value to 1 to every word appearing in given document.
    TermFrequency
    Feature algorithm creating document features (representative words) based on their frequency divided by the total number of words in document.
    TFIDF
    Feature algorithm creating document features (representative words) based on term frequency multiplied by inverse document frequency.
